channel.title: How do i to make a rar into a file
channel.description: well my topic explains it but........i want to play the server i download and it downloads as a rar and i was hoping it will download as a zip so i can extract it and play it??if thats not how makeing a server works tell me how to make a run butten so i can play butten on my server so i can play it plz!!!?!?!?? noob=mickster1997

item.title: How do i to make a rar into a file
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

right click the rar file
extract here
open the folder
check the run.bat first or else it might delete your system32 or something
if its safe click run.bat
if not edit the run.bat to something else
the run.bat can be also
initialize.bat or runeserver.bat

Read full topic

item.title: How do i to make a rar into a file
item.dc:creator: @lol_k lol k
item.description:
@lol_k wrote:

To Extract use winrar if your on windows that is.

if your on ubuntu you can use unrar with this command

sudo apt-get install unrar
